scripts.test-coverage: node --experimental-json-modules node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -x "commonjs/**" -x "modules/**" -x "*.test.js" node --experimental-json-modules node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --colors --reporter dot --require ./test/setup.js "./{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.test.js" --recursive
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover -x "commonjs/**" -x "modules/**" -x "*.test.js" node --experimental-json-modules node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --colors --reporter spec --require ./test/setup.js "./{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.test.js" --recursive
